name: Flingus
description:
Play as Flingus and fling yourself around dangerous obstacles with an attached magnetic ball!

This game was made in 48 hours for the 2021 GMTK game jam with the theme "Joined Together".

Controls: move around: arrow keys / WASD sit: down arrow key / S R: respawn at the last checkpoint move ball: mouse movement grab wall with ball: hold right mouse button down (only works on specific tiles)

The game turned out pretty difficult and we're curious how many people will complete it. If you did, leave us a comment!
